Hi all,
I need some help about monitoring heritrix via jconsole. I couldn't=

find a clue, I hope one of you guys can tell me where I am doing wrong.

H=
eritrix version is 1.14.1.
I am starting heritrix with this command:

% $HE=
RITRIX_HOME/bin/heritrix -a a:a
Wed Feb 18 23:56:19 EET 2009 Starting herit=
rix.....
Heritrix 1.14.1 is running.
Web console is at: http://127.0.0.1:80=
80
Web console login and password: a/a

Then I start jconsole

% $JAVA_HOME=
/bin/jconsole

It's ok if I try to connect as remote process. 
I see heritr=
ix on the local process list, but when I try to connect,
it says "Connectio=
n Failed: Retry? The connection to 12769 did not
succeed."

Shouldn't it be=
 possible to connect as local process, or is everything
just allright?

Tha=
nks in advance
